meaningMnemonic: You need to take a <radical>body</radical> <radical>measurement</radical> before you can <kanji>shoot</kanji>. Whether it's for a photo shoot, you're gonna shoot them with a gun, or if you're about to shoot them full of radiation for X-rays, you need the right measurements of that body first.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>shoot</kanji> is being done by a <reading>sha</reading>man (しゃ). Not only is he doing the body measurements for the shoot, but he's also going to be shooting you with a shot so you don't get the flu.
